ThingsCamp 3!

ThingsCamp comes to Bristol on April 8th. Find out more and get your ticket.

As more and more gets connected to the internet our digital lives have more possibilities, wider implications and greater risks than ever before. Explore them together.

Participate

Come to an event, join the conversation or just find out more.

Support

Help us to make ThingsCamp happen.

Host

Host the next ThingsCamp where you are. We'll help and provide resources.


Our New Website

We’ve just launched our new website as a resource for everyone who wants to attend, support or host a ThingsCamp.

Read More

ThingsCamp 3

ThingsCamp 3 will be our biggest yet: in addition to the main day on April 8th we’ll be hosting an open learning event at St. Paul’s Learning Centre on Friday April 7th from 2-5pm and #thingsdrinks on the Friday evening.
